channel.title: Source Help
channel.description:
I need help. How do i edit a source? like to say "Welcome to [Servername] Scape!" "Owner is Jack C"
How do i change from someone elses name and servername to mine?

item.title: Source Help
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“Jack C, post:1, topic:286334”]I need help. How do i edit a source? like to say “Welcome to [Servername] Scape!”
“Owner is Jack C”

How do i change from someone elses name and servername to mine?[/quote]
Most easy way i usd when i started coding was i would log on too my server look at login text and push Ctrl + f and search it but there are others use this ^^^ way at first.

Read full topic
